subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: From his 98-mile-per-hour fastball to his dancing curveball to his wicked slider, Joba Chamberlain had the look of a pitcher who could be a front-of-the-rotation starter for a decade.
snippet: From his 98-mile-per-hour fastball to his dancing curveball to his wicked slider, Joba Chamberlain had the look of a pitcher who could be a front-of-the-rotation starter for a decade.
